name: dA nav bar & links!
description:
dA's nav bar will scroll with you (with a little opacity so you can see what you're scrolling past) - and it has some awesome text-shadow!
In addition, the text will fade into a glowing white when you hover on it and the opacity with be upped a tiny bit. 
Also, hovering on any links will slowly fade into a glowing white in lowercase. :)

user.name: lluia

additional_info: I know there's already a bunch of fixed nav bar features but I personally liked it styled like this because it has text-shadow and a lowered opacity, in addition to glow! :) The links fade into a glow too.... it turns white only on some pages but it'll glow on all pages.
